# extent

**Instance Property**

The extent of the detected barcode’s bounds.

## Declaration

```swift
var extent: SIMD3<Float> { get }
```

## Discussion

The width of the detected barcode is the length along the X-axis, prior to rotation about the Y-axis.

The height of the detected barcode is the length along the Z-axis, prior to rotation about the Y-axis.

## Getting barcode information

- **originFromAnchorTransform**: The transform from the barcode anchor to the origin coordinate system.
- **payloadData**: The encoded payload data of the detected barcode.
- **payloadString**: The decoded payload string value of the detected barcode.
- **symbology**: The symbology of the detected barcode.
- **BarcodeAnchor.Symbology**: Values that describe specific kinds of barcodes.
- **id**: The unique identifier of an anchor.
